DOC.brief_summary: Crossover clinical evaluation three contact lens care regimen use one month Acuvue Oasys lenses .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison New Abbott Medical Optics ( AMO ) Multi-Purpose Solution ( MPS ) Existing Contact Lens Regimens
DOC.detailed_description: This three-arm crossover clinical evaluation 40 subject use three contact lens care regimens one month Acuvue Oasys lenses . The subject randomize order solution use : Investigational MPS , ClearCare , Opti-Free RepleniSH MPS .
DOC.criteria: Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer ; Has read sign information consent letter ; Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; Has ocular examination last two year ; Is current soft lens wearer use either twoweek monthly replacement lens ; Is correctable visual acuity 6/7.5 ( 20/25 ) good ( eye ) habitual vision correction ( either spectacles contact lens ) ; Has normal binocular vision ( strabismus , amblyopia ) ; Has clear cornea active ocular disease ; Has distance contact lens prescription +8.00 diopter ( D ) 12.00 D successful fit study lenses ; Has astigmatism le equal 1.00 D ; Agrees wear study lens daily wear basis . Has active ocular disease ; Has clinically significant lid , conjunctival , corneal abnormality may affect study outcome variable ; Has undergone corneal refractive surgery ; Has systemic condition may affect study outcome variable ; Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health ; Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; Is pregnant lactating ; Is participate clinical research study may affect study outcome variable ; Currently wear daily disposable lens extend wear lens .
